skills.description: Miya's basic attack against a target increases her attack speed by 5%, stacking up to 8 times or 40% attack speed lasting for 4 seconds.

Miya splits her Basic Attack into tw oarrows, dealing 5 (+105% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage to a main target and 30% Physical Damage to others. Lasts 4s. Her Basic Attack splits only once.

Miya shoots a barrage of arrows towards a designated area, dealing 5 hits of damage to enemies. Each hit deals 30(+15% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage and slows enemies by 30% for 2 s. Enemies who are hit by 4 times of Rain of Arrows will be frozen for 1 s.
Miya removes all Debuffs and conceals for 1.5s with her Movement Speed increased by 45%. Meanwhile, her Attack Speed is increased by 35% for 6s.
Balmond recovers 4% of his max HP upon killing enemy minions, and recover 10% when killing enemy heroes.

Balmond charges towards an enemy and deals 150 / 175 / 200 / 225 / 250 / 275 (+60%Total Physical Attack) points of Physical Damage to enemies along the way. After hitting the target, he will immediately stop and slow that enemy's movement speed by 60%. Lasts 2.5 seconds
For 3 seconds, Balmond brandishes a large axe and continuously deals 80 / 105 / 130 / 135 / 180 / 205 (+45%Total Physical Attack) points of Physical Damage to nearby enemies.

Balmond raises a giant axe, dealing 350 / 500 / 650 (+50%Total Physical Attack) plus 20% True Damage of the target's lost HP to enemies in a fan-shaped area in front of him, and slowing them by 60% for 2 seconds. Deals up to 1300 points of damage to non-hero units.
Saber's damage reduces Physical Defense by 7. Stacks up to 5 times. Lasts 5 seconds.

Saber shoots out 4 flying swords, with each sword dealing up to 160 (+90% Extra Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage. Swords will spin around for awhile and then fly back to Saber. Using Charge will call the swords back earlier. Swords also deal damage if they hit an enemy on their way back. This skill enjoys only 40% of Spell Vamp.
Saber charges towards a designated place, dealing 80 (+40% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage to enemies along the way.
Saber attacks an enemy hero, knocking the target into the air for 1.2s, and then dealing 3 blows continuously. Each blow deals 200 (+130% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage.

When a nearby Minion dies, it generates a blood orb. Each blood orb alice absorbs will permanently increase her Max HP by 10. AFter absorbing 12/25/50 blood orbs, she will receive permanently 10% CD Reduction/10% Magic Lifesteal/40 Movement Speed.
Alice casts Blood Stream in the designated direction, dealing 350 (+180% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to enemies. Using this skill again to immediately teleport to the Stream's location.
Alice deals 270 (+90% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to nearby enemies, immobilizing them for 1.2s. Enemies will be slowed by 70% after the immobilization. Lasts 0.8s

Alice enters the blood-sucking state for 5s, dealing 160 (+70% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to surrounding enemies every 0.5s while restoring 80(+30% Total Magic Power) HP for herself. If the target is a non-hero unit, she restores 50% of HP

Molina's blessing will transform Nana for 2 seconds when she takes a deadly damage. Within this duration, Nana is immune to all damage and her Movement Speed increases by 70%. Under transformed state Nana recovers 10% of her Max HP but she can't uses skills. The blessings trigger every 120 seconds.

Nana launches a magic boomerang in the designated direction. Each time the boomerange hits an enemy, it will deal 220 (+80% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage and slow enemies by 40% for 1.5s. The first enemy takes full damage, the next one takes 20% less damge, up to 60% less damage.

Nana summons Molina to the designated area. After a short delay, Molina locks onto an enemy hero, chases them, and morphs them, dealing 250 (+50% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage and slowing them by 50% for 1.5s. Reduces Magic Defense of transformed heroes by 25%.

Nana summons Molina to attack the designated area 3 times. Each attack deals 400 (+180% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to enemies in the area and slows them by 50% for 2s. If Molina Blitz hits a single enemy continously, that enemy will be stunned for 1s.

Tigreal gains a layer of blessing when using skills or being hit by basic attacks (Those from minions are excluded). He gains immunity to the next basic attack after gaining 4 layers(Those from minions are excluded).
Tigreal fires an attack wave in a specified direction, dealing 300(+80%Total Physical Attack) points of Physical Damage to the enemies and lowering their movement speed b 65% for 2 seconds.

Tigreal charges in a specified direction and collides with enemies, dealing 0(+100%Total Physical Attack) points of Physical Damage. Using this skill again to launch a second attack, dealing 180(+60%Total Physical Attack) points of Physical Damage and knocking them into the air.

Tigreal forcefully thrust his sword into the earth, pulling surrounding enemies to himself, and dealing 270(+130%Total Physical Attack) points of Physical Damage and stunning them for 1.5 seconds. (This skill can be interrupted by transformation and knock up effects.)
If this skill hits 1 enemy, it deals damage x1.2. If it hits 2 enemy, it deals damage x1.1. Alucard's Next basic attack after using any skill deals damage x1.2 and makes him move to the target.
Alucard leaps forward and launches 1 strike. Each strike deals 240(+160%Total Physical Attack) points of Physical Damage and slow the enemies.
Alucard slashes at nearby enemies, dealing 230(+140%Extra Physical Attack) points of Physical Damage.

Alucard gains physical lifesteal by 20% and locks onto an enemy, meanwhile his lifesteal effect is increases by 100%. Lasts 8 seconds. During the time, he can fire a powerful attack wave forward, dealing 440(+220%Extra Physical Attack) points of Physical Damage.
After attacking a target twice in a row, Karina's third attack will deal extra True Damage to the target that equals to 10% of enemy's lost HP.

Karina enters a state of Elusiveness for 3 seconds, making her immune to basic attacks and increasing her movement speed by 35%. In this state, her basic attack slows the enemy and must be a crit hit, dealing extra 165(+75%Total Magic Power) points of Magical Damage. Getting a kill or an assist from it will reduce this skill's cooldown by 60%.
Karina brandishes her double swords, dealing 260(+130%Total Magic Power) points of Magical Damage to surrounding enemies. Getting a kill or an assist from it will reduce this skill's cooldown by 60%.

Karina rapidly rushes toward a target, dealing 430(+220%Total Magic Power) points of Magical Damage. Getting a kill from it will immediately reset this skill's cooldown while getting an assist will reduce its cooldown by 80%.
Everytime a skill is used, Akai gains a shield that absorbs up to 6% of his maximum HP. Lasts 2 seconds, this effect has a 2.5 second cooldown.

Akai jumps towards a designated location. Upon landing, Akai deals 300(+65%Total Physical Attack) points of Physical Damage to enemy units, while expercieincing a slow effect for 2 seconds. Akai deals bonus damage to marked enemies and causes a stun effect for 1 seconds.

Akai removes all CC effects from him and spins like a tornado for 3.5 seconds. Each collision knocks back the target and deals 180(+165%Extra Physical Attack) points of Physical Damage (damage decays against the same target). During the time, Akai becomes immune to all CC effects and gains movement speed by 30%

Akai fires a frog shaped shockwave in the designated direction that explodes on contact with enemies or once it reaches maximum range, dealing 350(+135%Extra Physical Attack) points of Physical Damage and marking them for 4 seconds. His basic attacks on marked targets deal extra 8% of Akai's maximum health as physical damage.
Increases movement speed by 15% and regens 3% of max health per seconds if Franco is not hit for a shortime.

Franco casts a hook toward an enemy unit or direction, snagging the first enemy unit on hit, dealing 550(+150%Total Physical Attack) points of Physical Damage and then dragging the unit back to Franco.
Franco lashes out and terrifies enemies, dealing 300 + MaxHP worth of Physical Damage to nearby enemies and slowing their movement speed by 70% for 1.5 seconds.
Franco suppressess an enemy unit with 6 hacks in a row, disabling them and deal 60(+80%Total Physical Attack) points of Physical Damage per hit.

Bane's weapon is infused with Tidal Energy every 10s. Damage of his next basic attack is increased by 60-90% and deals extra splash damage to nearby enemies. Hitting an enemy hero with skills will decrease the infusion time of Tidal Energy by 2.5s. Hitting non-hero units will decrease the infusion time of Tidal Energy by 1s

Bane fires a Crab Claw Cannon in a specified direction, dealing 180(+140% Total Physical Attack) points of Physical Damage to the first target hit. Then the cannon will rebound to an enemy unit randomly, dealing 150% damage of this skill.(Attack enemy heroes first) If Bane uses Crab Claw Cannon and kills the target, Bounce Damage will be increased by.

Bane takes a sip of rum, immediately restoring 260(+200%Total Magic Power) HP and increasing his movement speed by 30%. Bane can then spit venom forward in a fan-shaped area, dealing 100(+100%Total Physical Attack)-200(+200%Total Physical Attack) points of Magical Damage. The longer the venom is brewed, the more damage it will deal.

Bane summons a school of shark to move to a designated location. When they hit enemies, they will deal 500 (+160%Total Physical Attack) points of Physical Damage and decrease Movement Speed by 40% and Attack Speed by 50%. Lasts 3s. Deals 40% of damage to Turrets.

Each time Bruno's skills cause damage, his Crit Chance will be increased by 4%. Stacks up to 5 times. Since Mecha Legs are infused with power, Bruno can deal more damage, but the extra ATK speed only takes effect by 80%.

Bruno infuses the power to his Mecha Legs, his next Basic Attack will kick a powerball directly and hit an enemy target, dealing 110(+100% Total Physical Attack) points of Physical Damage and slowing the target by 30% for 0.5s. The powerball can be rebounded to Bruno when hitting the target. Bruno of his teammatess can pick up the energy ball to reduce the CD of Flying Tackle by 1s and Bruno will have the powerball again.

Bruno makes a forward slide tackle, dealing 140 (+40% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage to enemies and stunning them for 0.5s. If Bruno casts Flying Tackle while there is a powerball rebounding to him, he will pull back this powerball immediately.

Bruno kicks an energy ball with full power at a specified hero, dealing 250 / 350 / 450 (+95% Total Physical Attack) points of Physical Damage, knocking back the target and reducing enemy's Physical Defense by 3 / 6 / 9. Afterwards the energy ball will ricochet among enemy heroes (Up to 10 times). Every hit deals 150(+60% Total Physical Attack) points of Physical Damage. Physical Defense reducing effect lasts 8 seconds. Stacks up to 3 times.
Each time Clint casts a skill, his next basic attack penetrates a line of targets, dealing 120% of his normal damage.

Clint projects a smoke bomb, dealing 200 / 220 / 240 / 260 / 280 / 300 (+50%Total Physical Attack) points of Physical Damage to enemies in the area. The basic attacks' hit rate of enemy heroes in the smoke area are decreased by 25% / 35% / 45% / 55% / 65% / 75% While their movement speeds are decreased by 60%

Clint steps back a little and shoots a trap of net forward, dealing 140 / 160 / 180 / 200 / 220 / 240 (+30%Total Physical Attack)(+30%Total Magic Power) points of Physical Damage to the first enemy hit and slowing the enemy.
Clint launches a grenade in a specified direction, exploding and dealing 250 / 300 / 350 (+80%Total Physical Attack) points of Physical Damage on hit. Clint can have up to 5 grenades.

Rafaela penalizes the target who has killed her (the target should be within a certain range). She charges for 2 seconds and then sends the penalization power to the target, dealing True Damage equal to 25% of the target's Max HP, it can be blocked by other enemy heroes. This skill works only on enemy heroes.

Rafaela uses the power of Holy Light to deal 225 (+120% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to the three nearest enemies, revealing them for a short period of time and slowing them by 40% for 1.5s. If this skill hits the same target within 5s, then the damage of this skill will increase by 20%. Stacks up to 3 times.

Rafaela summons Holy Light to regenerate 370 (+50% Total Magic Power) HP for herself and the most-injured nearby ally. Regenerates 90 (+25% Total Magic Power) HP for other nearby allied heroes. Increases their Movement Speed by 50% within the following 1s.
Rafaela uses the power of Holy Light to punish enemies in front of her, dealing 460 (+120% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage and stunning them for 1.5s, at the same time, slowing them by 40%.
Eudora's skills inflict the target with the Superconductor effect that makes them take more magic damage from her.

Eudora casts a forked lightning to deal 450 (+230% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area in front of her, inflicting the Superconductor effect that reduces MAgic Defense by 15 points.

Eudora strikes an enemy with a bolt of lightning, dealing 350 (+105% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage and stunning the target for 0.75s. Enemies under the Superconductor state are stunned for 0.75s more.

Eudora summons a great storm of lightning, dealing 700 (+270% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to the main target and 400 (+180% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to other enemies around the target. Enemies under the Superconductor state take 15% more damage.

Every 6 seconds, the next basic attack will combo hit the target in front of him multiple times, dealing a total of 1.8 times basic attack damage. Hitting enemies with a basic attack will reduce cooldown time for this ability 0.5s.
Zilong lifts an enemy over his back, dealing 300 (+140% Total Physical ATK) Physical Damage and reducing the target's Physical Defense by 10 for 2s.
Zilong dashes toward the target, dealing 260 (+30% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage. Then he performs a quick Basic Attack immediately.
Zilong increases his Movement Speed by 30% and Attack Speed by 45%, becoming immune to Slowing Effect for 6s. Removes Debuffs upon casting.

According to her flying speed, Fanny's damage while flying is increased by 15% - 30% and leaves a Prey mark on the target which can stack up to 2 times. Dealing damage to enemies with the Prey marks regen energy for Fanny (10 per stack).(Energy gained from dealing damage to multiple enemy heroes in a short time decays)
Fanny whirls her blade, dealing 260 (+90% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage to nearby enemies.

Fanny throws out a cable that draws her to the first obstacle that it touches. Each successive use of this skill within 3s decreases its energy cost by 1 and changes her flying direction. If energy is sufficient and she hits an enemy while flying, Tornado Strike will be triggered.
Fanny initiates a quick attack on an enemy, dealing 500 (+240% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage. Each stack of Prey Mark of enemies will increase her damage by 20%.
Layla's basic attacks and skills deal more damage to the enemies that are further away, from 100% up to 130%.
Layla fires a Malefic Energy Bomb forward, dealing 200 (+80% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage to the first enemy hit. Malefic Energy Bomb enjoys Crit Effect.

Layla fires an energy ball that explodes, dealing 170 (+65% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage to the target and nearby enemies, slowing them by 40% for 2s. The skill range scales with levels.
Layla fires an energy cannon, dealing 500 (+150% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage to enemies in front of her. Building this skill also increases her basic attack range by 0.4 points.

Minotaur's rage increases whenever his basic attacks and skills hit an enemy unit. Once Minotaur's rage reaches its maximum, he will enter a rage state and gain bonus damage, armor and magic resistance (increases with level). Skills also gain bonus effects. After Minotaur loses his rage state, he can not recover rage for a brief period.

Minotaur jumps towards a designated location. Upon landing, he will deal 280 (+60% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage to all surrounding enemies and slow them by 65%. Lasts 2. Minotaur will recover Rage when he hits enemies with this skill. Rage State: The attack range becomes much alrger, dealing extra Physical Damage equal to 1.5% of target's Max HP.

Minotaur motivates himself and surrounding allies, regenerating 260 HP of them and enjoying an extra healing effect based on the damage he has taken. Within the next 2s, Minotaur recovers Rage when hit by Basic Attacks. Rage State: Minotaur gains Rage Regen Effect within 2s, causing him to recover HP when hit by Basic Attacks.

Minotaur enters a Rage-save state where he continuously recovers Rage. The longer this skill is charged, the more Rage he recovers. Rage state: Minotaur smashes the ground 3 times, sending shockwaves that deal 180 (+85% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage to surrounding enemies, knocking them airborne and slowing them by 70%. The final shockwave deals 200(+85% Total Physical ATK) points of True Damage.

If Lolita takes no damage in 5 seconds, Noumenon Energy Core will provide a shield that can take 300(+40*Hero Level) points of damage, lasting 20s. Lolita's nearby allies can get shields while approaching her.

Lolita dashes in the designated direction. In the next 4s, her next Basic Attack will take her to the enemy target, dealing Physical Damage equal to 200 (+100% Total Physical ATK) plus 7.5% of the target's Max HP. Meanwhile, the target will be stunned for 0.8s. Deals 200 (+100% Total Physical ATK) plus 50% of target's Max HP to Minions.

Lolita raises her shield to block all incoming Ranged Basic Attacks and Projectiles. Use again: Lolita launches Energy Blast, dealing 400 (+50% Total Physical ATK) to 880 (+110% Total Physical ATK) Physical Damage. The more Projectiles and Basic Attacks the shield blocks, the more damage Energy Blast will deal.

Lolita gains a shield from her Passive. Then after charging for 2s, she deals 350 (+100% Total Physical ATK) to 700 (+200% Total Physical ATK) Physical Damage in a fan-shaped area in front of her. When casting at Max Charge, Lolita will also stun her enemies for 2s (Tap again to cast immediately). When charging, Lolita slows enemies in a fan-shaped area by 75%.
Hayabusa's ninjutsu damage adds 1 Shadow Stack. Every stack increases Hayabusa's ninjutsu damage by 5%

Hayabusa throws three shurikens forward that travel back to him after flying a certain distance. Each shurikens deals 160(+70% Extra Physical Attack) points of Physical Damage to enemies and slows them. Hayabusa also recovers 10 points of energy. Damage and regenerative effects of this skills decay over times. Every level of this skill will grant Hayabusa 3% spell vamp.

Hayabusa moves towards a designated direction and releases a phantom behind him. If the phantom hits an enemy, it will split into 3 phantoms that travels in different directions. When phantoms hit enemy heroes, they will slow the enemy hero by 60%, deal 130(+30% Extra Physical Attack) points of Physical Damage, and seep into the enemy hero. Hayabusa can reactive this skill to travel to a phantoms location. If that phantom happens to be in an enemy hero, Hayabusa will deal an additional 130(+30% Extra Physical Attack) points of Physical Damage. Every time Hayabusa travels using Quad Shadow, the cooldown for Shurikens is reduced.

Hayabusa turns into a shadow and dashes around the battlefield, dealing multiple hits of damage to enemies within a certain area. Each attack deals 160(+90% Extra Physical Attack) points of Physical Damage.

Freya generates a sacred orb surrounding her every 2 Basic Attacks. When she has 3 orbs around her, the orbs will move faster and each orb will 30 (+60% Total Physical ATK) damage to enemies. (The orb has no effect on Minions).

Freya jumps to a designated area, dealing 200 / 220 / 240 / 260 / 280 (+75% Extra Physical ATK) Physical Damage to enemies in the area and pulling them to the middle. Sacred Orb Enchances: Sacrifices 1/2/3 stacks of Sacred Orb, increasing the damage to 120%/160%/200%, extending the area of effect and stunning the targets for 0.3/0.6/0.9s

Freya dashes forward and gains a shield that can absorb 160 / 180 / 200 / 220 / 240 / 260 (+70% Extra Physical ATK) , while dealing 160 / 180 / 200 / 220 / 240 / 260 (+90% Total Physical ATK) Physical Damage to the enemies and slowing them by 30% for 0.5s. Sacred Orb Enchances: the skill can be recast in 4s at the cost of 1 Sacred Orb up to 4 times. Freya will swing the hammer on the 4th cast increasing the damage to 240 / 270 / 300 / 330 / 360 / 390 (+135% Total Physical ATK) and knocking the enemies airborne for 0.5s.

Freya enters Valkyrie state, dealing 360 (+150% Extra Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage to surrounding enemies and slowing them by 40%. Lasts 2s. Meanwhile her Attack is increased by 20, and Physical and Magic Defense are increased by 15. Using this skill grants a shield that absorbs at least 200 (+50% Total Physical ATK) Damage, based on the number of enemies she hits. Lasts 10s.
In a short period of time, Gord deals 4 hits of damage and an additional 160(+70% Total Magic Power) points of True Damage.

Gord throws a Mystic Projectile at a designated are that then jumps forward twice. Upon coming in contact with an enemy unit, the bomb deals 270(+80% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage in the area and stun enemies for 1s.
Gord summons an energy field, dealing 80(+20% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage every 0.45 seconds to enemies. This also works for his Passive Effect

Gord fires a sustained blast of energy in a designated direction, dealing 190 (+60% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage every 0.3s to enemies and slowing them by 10%. Lasts 3s. The direction of the blast can be changed by using the Left Joystick during this time.

Natalia deals extra 15% damage wehn attacking enemies from behind. If Natalia is in bush for 2s without taking or dealing damage, she will eneter Conceal State. 5s after leaving bush or dealing damage will make her appear. Under Conceal State, her Movement Speed is increased by 20% and her next Basic Attack will take her to the behind of enemies and deal extra 25% damage, silencing them for 1s.
Natalia dashes forward, dealing 250 (+50% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage to enemies along the path. This skill can be cast again within a short period of tiem after hitting an enemy.

Natalia casts a smoke bomb that lasts 4s on the current spot. In the smoke, enemies will be slowed by 55%. Meanwhile, Natalia increases her Attack Speed by 30% and becomes immune to all Basic Attacks.
Natalia triggers Assassin Instinct and enters Stealth, empowering her basic attack and increases her Physical ATK by 20 / 35 / 50 for 3s. Use Again: This skill can be used again in 5s.

When Kagura takes Seimei Umbrella, she will gain a shield that absorbs up to 280(+50% Total Magic Power) damage, stunning nearby enemies for 0.5s and slowing them by 60%. Lasts 2s. This effect only activates every 4.5s.

Kagura moves Seimei Umbrella to the designated area, dealing 330 / 385 / 440 / 495 / 550 / 605(+150% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to enemies along the way and slowing them by 60%. Lasts 1s.

With Seimei Umbrella, Kagura removes all Debuffs on her and moves in a designated direction, leaving the Umbrella behind. dealing 300(+90% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to the nearby enemies.
With Seimei Umbrella, Kagura deals 260 (+120% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage, knocking back nearby enemies and slowing them by 65% for 1s.
After every 8 yards Chou moves, his next basic attack will deal 200% of damage (can't be critic) and shortly slow enemies by 80%.

Chou punches forward up to 3 times continuously. Each punch deals 180(+70% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage. The 3rd attack knocks nearby enemies into the air. The 3rd attack resets the CD of Shunpo.

Chou dashes a short distance, becoming immune to CC effects during the dash. After the dash, Chou increases his Physical Penetration by 15 points and obtains a Shield that can absorb 200(+150% Extra Physical ATK) points of damage for 2s.

Chou casts a roundhouse kick to knock back the target and deals 400(+200% Extra Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage. Use the skill again to chase up the enemy in the air, dealing at least 400(+200% Extra Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage.
Enemy units near Sun or his doppelgangers experiences a 6%% reduction in physical defense. Stacks up to 10 times.

Sun hurls his Golden Staff towards a designated direction dealing 250(+60%Total Physical ATK) physical damage. Monsters or enemy heroes that come in contact with the Staff will be slowed by 60% for 2 seconds. Sun also summons a doppelganger to attack the enemies. Doppleganger posseses 40% of Sun's stats and lasts 5 seconds
Sun and his doppelganger launch an instantaneous attack against targeted enemy unit, dealing 180(60%Total Physical ATK) points of physical damage.
Sun summons a doppelganger that has 70%/85%/100% of his attributes. Doppelgangers take more damage. However, each of their attacks recover Sun's HP. Doppelgangers last 12 seconds.
Using skills will summon Beta to attack and mark the target. Beta will attack the target continuously after 2 mark(s), dealing 150 pts of true damage in total.

Alpha launches a slash forward, dealing 210 (+90% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage to enemies along the way and slowing them by 40% for 2s. After the light wave is launched, Beta will follow its trace to strafe enemies, dealing 90 (+90% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage.

After charging for a while, Alpha strikes forward in a fan-shaped area and deals 160 (+170% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage to enemies and slow them. Each hit increases his Attack Speed by 5% and restores 150(+40% Total Magic Power) HP. When cahrging phase ends, Beta will strafe enemies within attack range, dealing 40 (+30% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage.

Alpha wields the light spear powerfully, stunning enemies for 1.3s and pulling himself to them, dealing 245 (+140% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage along the way. When the light spear hits enemies, it will guide Beta to strafe toward the target area, dealing 205 (+80% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage.

Ruby has 5% Physical Lifesteal Effect on her own and inherits 125% Physical LIfesteal Effect from Equipment. (Her Basic Attack enjoys no lifesteal effect). After any skill is cast, Ruby can jump to another place, increasing 16(+1.6*Hero Level) points of Physical and Magic Defense for a short period of time. (Effect scales with levels. Stacks up to 3 times and lasts 4s.

Ruby quickly slashes her scythe forward, dealing 60 (+60% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage. At the same time, she casts a shockwave forward, dealing 90 (+90% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage to enemies and slowing them by 40% for 2s.

Ruby wields her giant scythe to attack twice. Every attack deals 60 (+55% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage, stunning enemies for 0.5s and slowly pulling them to her. Deals extra 20% damage to enemies in the outer ring.
Ruby uses the scythe to attack in a wide range, dealing 205 (+180% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage to enemies, pulling them to her and stunning them for 0.5s.

Yi Sun-shin chooses his longbow or glaive to attack according to his distance from his enemies. Using the glaive to attack will deal more damage and reduce the CD of One-wave Sweep by 1s. A navy fleet will be summoned at the allied Base to strengthen it. Yi Sun-shin can board the Turtle Ship beside the base periodically and get buffs.

With glaive in hand, Yi Sun-shin slashes forward, dealing 160 (+100% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage to enemies along the way and slowing them by 30% for 2s. When Yi Sun-shin is on his Turtle Ship, the ship will dash in the designated direction, dealing 200 (+100% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage to the first enemy it collides with and enemies nearby, stunning them for 1.5s.

Yi Sun-shin shoots a piercing arrow at full strength, dealing 160 (+100% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage to enemies as well as slowing them by 40%. Lasts 2s. The arrow's attack range and damage scale with charge time. The first enemy takes full damage, the next one takes 20% less (up to 60% less damage). When charging, his Movement Speed will be reduced slightly.
Yi Sun-shin summons the naval fleet to launch 3 waves of rocket attacks. Each wave deals 165 (35% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage and will also slow enemies slightly.
Moskov’s basic attack can penetrate the targets and deal damage to enemies behind them. Hitting enemies successfully will reduce the cooldown of Abyss Walker and Spear of Misery by 0.7s.
Moskov uses the power of shadow to teleport to the specified position, enhancing attack’s penetration ability and increasing 20% attack speed, lasting 3s.

Moskov strikes at an enemy hero with full strength, dealing 140 pts of physical damage and knocking back the target. If the airbone target collides with another enemy hero, then both enemies will receive 210 pts of physical damage and be stunned for 1s. If knocking into obstacles, the target will be stunned for 2s. The enemy's that hit cannot go into stealth mood for a while.

Moskov throws out the Spear of Destruction after powering up shortly, dealing 450 pts of physical damage to enemies along a straight line. Every enemy it hits, it increases 10 pts of physical attack to Moskov, stacking up to 5 times, lasting 5s.
When Johnson's HP is lower than 30%, he generates a shield that absorbs 300(+700% Total Physical DEF) points of damage for 10s. This effect has a cooldown of 100s.

Johnson throws a spanner in the designated direction that deals 200 (+150% Total Physical DEF) points of Magic Damage to enemies in its path. Enemies in the area that the spanner lands will be stunned by 0.8s.

Johnson raises his shield, continuously dealing 80 (+20% Total Physical DEF) points of Magic Damage forwards in a fan-shape range and slowing enemies. While holding the shield, Johnson can cast Basic Attack and skills.

Passive: Permanently Increases Physical Defense by 10%. Johnson jumps up and transforms into a car, accelerating over time. Only 1 teammate can get in the car when it's moving slowly, and then they will rush forward along with Johnson. The car will explode upon hitting an enemy hero, stunning the target and nearby enemies for 0.5s-1s, and dealing 300 (+90% Total Magic Power) - 750 (+225% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage according to the car's speed. After the explosion, the ground will be electrified, slowing enemies and dealing 80 (+20% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to those who are in the area. When the car is going slowly, tap the skill Throttle again to move faster. Tap the skill Brake to stop immediately.
The deep bond with the stars grants Cyclops the power to manipulate time. The current cooldown of all skills will be reduced by 0.5 seconds when his abilities hit.
Cyclops casts two shock waves of stardust towards, each dealing 245(+60% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to the enemy.

Cyclops use the power of the stars to generate a starlit sphere spinning around him and increases 30% of his own Movement Speed within 2s. The sphere will attack nearby enemy heroes first, dealing 210 (+50% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to them. (Damages dealt to the same target will decay.)

Cyclops creates a gigantic magic sphere filled with a planetary power to chase his enemy, dealing 500 (+220% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage. The target will be immobilized for 1s-2s based on the distance the sphere travels.

Code of Moon Elves will charge energy into Estes slowly. Upon reaching 100 stacks it will enhance Estes' next basic Attack, dealing 250 (+100% Physical Attack) (+150% Magic Power) Magic Damage and slowing down enemies by 60% for 1.5 seconds. The basic attack will ricochet, dealing 125 (+50% Physical Attack) (+75% Magic Power) Magic Damage to surrounding enemies slowing them by 60% for 1.5 seconds. Charging time scales with casting Enhanced Moonlight Immersion on number of allies and casting Moonlight Immersion on a single ally.

Estes restores 250 (+30% Total Magic Power) points of HP for the target hero immediately and links himself with the target for 3s, restoring 325 (+30% Total Magic Power) points of HP for the target slowly. Linking with an ally will also improve his own Attack, and increase the energy charging speed of the Code of Moon Elves. (Scales with the number and the attributes of allied heroes.) Being too far from the target will break the link.

Estes drops a flood of moonlight upon the designated area, dealing 350 (+70% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to enemy units within it. Afterwards, it turns to a domain of Moon Goddess. Enemies will be slowed down by 90% when they touch the barrier of the domain area. Lasts 1.5s. (This slowing Effect will disappear slightly with the time.)

Estes will immediately cast ehanced Moonlight Immersion to all allied heroes nearby. Enhance Moonlight Immersion within 8s. Meanwhile, he will regenerate 1260 (+105% Total Magic Power) points of HP continously.

Hilda's HP regen speed increases when she's in the bush.Entering the bush will give her a shield, this effect can only be triggered every 10 sec. When Hilda's HP runs low, she can obtain a great HP regen ability, this effect can only be triggered every 120 sec.

Activates the great sword's rune power, temporarily increasing hero’s movement speed. Additionally, it’ll increase the physical damage dealt in the next basic attack, with slowing down effect, also dealing physical damage to enemies behind the target.

Locks onto one enemy target for pursuit, skill can be released 3 times maximum, the second attack will deal damage to target's surroundings, the third attack will knock back target and surrounding enemies temporarily, each time dealing physical damage.

Hilda jumps toward the target and slashes powerfully and temporarily stuns the target, at the same time dealing physical damage to enemy units surrounding the target.Each kill or or assist attack will increase the magnitude of the skill, and once the maximum magnitude is reached, a set amount of extra damage can be dealt to enemies.

Each time her skill is cast, one unit of frost energy will be added to Aurora. When 4 units of frost energy is collected, the next damage of Frozen freezes the target. Lasts 1.5s. All skills can deal extra 30% Magic Damage to the targets with Frozen Effect.

Aurora fires forward a Frost Energy Missile. Upon hitting enemies, it will detonate and deal 300 / 260 / 420 / 480 / 540 / 600 (+130% Magic Power) Magic Damage and slow enemies by 30% lasting for 1.5 seconds.
Deals 430 / 510 / 590 / 670 / 750 / 830 (+180% Magic Power) Magic Damage at specified target and causing the target's movement speed to drop to 80% for 1.5 seconds

Summons a giant icy rock to bombard a designated target location, all enemy heroes hit will be slowed down and receive 900 / 1100 / 1300 (+180% Magic Power) Magic Damage. Surrounding enemies of the target location where the rock lands also will be slowed down and receive 450 / 550 / 650 (+180% Magic Power) points of Magic Damage.

Lapu Lapu will gain a stack of Bravery Blessing after hitting an enemy with a basic attack or skill,after gaining 5 stacks Lapu Lapu's next basic attack will deal extra damage (this basic attack cannot deal critical damage) and will also give Lapu Lapu a shield worth 500-1200 damage resistance (scales with level)

Lapu-Lapu launches two boomeranging blades of light forward. Each blade deals 120(+5) Physical Damage to enemies hit on its way out and when returning. Multiple hits on the same enemy only grant 1 stack of Bravery Blessing.
Charges with his twin blades, dealing 100(+64) Physical Damage to enemies on the path, increasing his movement speed for a short time at hit of enemy hero.

Combines twin blades into one heavy sword and slashes forward, dealing 400(+20) Physical Damage to enemies and stunning them for 0.8 seconds. Enters Heavy Sword state for 15 seconds afterwards. Using this skill increases your physical and magical defense by 30 for 8 seconds.

Vexana adds Necromancer to targets who take damage from her. Lassts 5s. While the spell lasts, the target will explode upon death, dealing 220-500 (+50% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to surrounding units (Basic Damage increases with level). Vexana summons puppets to attack enemies and will also add Necromancer on them.
Vexana unleashes phantom power forward, dealing 280(+60% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage. Heroes hit will lose control and rotate in a place for 1 second.
Summons an other-worldly power to deal 500(+200% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to a specified location.

Vexana puts a curse on an enemy hero that last 8 seconds (cannot be actively dispelled), and deals 250(+80% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage, plus an additional 75(+20% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage per second. If a target dies while under the curse, or the curse's duration comes to an end, Vexana will summon a puppet in the form of the target, that will follow her into battle. Puppets inherit 70% of the target's attributes, and continuously deal 5% of the puppet's Max HP as Magic Damage to surrounding enemies. Puppet last 20 seconds.

In human form, Roger's basic attacks lower enemy movement speed by 20%. In wolf form, basic attacks add damage equal to a percentage of HP already lost by the enemy (up to 60 added damage to Jungle Monsters).

Roger rapidly shoots twice, dealing 300 (+120% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage in total. The first Hunter Net slows enemies by 80%. Lasts 1.5s. The second one reduces Physical Defense of enemies by 10. Lasts 5s.
Roger increases his movement speed by 50% for 2.5s.

Roger lunges forward and turns into a wolf, dealing 200 (+100% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage and slowing enemies by 90%. Lasts 0.8s. Passive: In Wolf form, Roger increases 40 Points of Physical and Magic Defense and increases his Movement Speed by 40.

Adds a Lightwheel Mark to the enemy at each basic attack or skill. When Lightwheel mark is added up to 5 marks at the target, they become actual lightwheel, piercing the target and dealing 7%-13% true damage of max HP, damage is added up to 300 towards jungle monsters.

Karrie releases flywheels and deals 200 (+90% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage on the path. When the flywheels go to the end, they deal 100 (+20% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage to nearby enemies and slow them by 80% continously. Lasts 1s.
Move towards the target direction while releasing a flywheel to the most nearby enemy, dealing 150 damage. Releases 2 flywheels on ultimate state.

Karrie enters Dual Wield Mode. Within the next 6s, her Movement Speed will be increased by 20%. Releases 2 lightwheels on each Basic Attack, but each Basic Attack only deals 50% damage and her Attack Speed is reduced by 20%.

Gatokaca converts 3% of his lost HP to Physical Defense, up to 250. Dealing damage to enemies who have higher HP than him regenerates 110-250 HP (increases with level) plus HP equal to 0.5x of his Physical Defense. This effect can only trigger once every 6s.

Gatotkaca shatters the ground in front of him, dealing 220(+90% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage and slows enemies. Deals 30(+20% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to enemies on Gatotkaca's shattered earth and slows them by 50%

Gatokaca charges and loudly shouts towards a designated direction, taunting enemies to attack him and deals 90 (+60% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage. The taunt duration is determined by how long Gatokaca charges this skill. Taunt lasts for up to 1.3s. Within the first 2.5s of casting this skill, Gatokaca reflects damage upon nearby enemies and deals up to 90 plus 1.5% of his Max HP points of Magic Damage.

Gatotkaca charges up and jumps to the designated area, knocking nearby enemies into the air for 1 second and deals 500(+300% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage. Enemy units near to the center of the area are knocked into the air for a longer duration.
Since he knows the essence of magic so well, Harley's basic attack will deal 60 (+50% physical attack) (+60% magic power) magical damage to the enemy.

Harley shoots forward multiple rounds of cards at speed, dealing magical damage to the first enemy hit. Each time an enemy is hit, Harley's attack speed will increase, up to 8 times, lasting 3 seconds.

Harley disappears then reappears further forward, leaving his magic hat behind. After using this skill Harley's movement speed will increase for a period of time; if this skill is used again within a short time, Harley will return to his original spot where the hat is

Locks onto an enemy target in sight and launches a fire ring (can be blocked by other heroes), dealing significant magical damage when it hits the enemy, generating a big fire ring around the target for a few seconds. Harley's skills will then only need to hit the fire ring to deal damage to the target, after the skills effect subsides additional magical damage will be inflicted too.

Irithel and Leo know each so well that it allows her to shoot while moving. Each basic attack shoots out 3 heavy arrows(it takes a while to reload the heavy bow), each arrow deals 42% Physical Damage (Only the first arrow can trigger gear passive abilities)
Irithel shoots a round of arrows, dealing 250 (+60% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage to the enemies in the area and reducing their Physical Defense by 15 for 3s.
Leo shouts loudly, dealing 200 (+60% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage to the enemies in the area and slowing them by 80% for 2s.

Irithel controls Leo to jump forward and equips a heavy crossbow, after which her Basic Attack will deal 80 (+126% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage to a target and nearby enemies for 15s.
Increases his movement speed by 10%, and 26-180 Physical and Magical Defense (increases with level) when Grock is near to a wall or a turret.

Grock raises weapon to sweep nearby enemies, dealing 300 (+40% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage and slowing them by 40%. Lasts 2s. Damage scales with charge time. Stay near to a wall while casting Power of Nature to become immune to Crowd Control Effects.
Grock releases a shockwave towards a designated location, dealing 300 (+50% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage. Then the shockwave becomes a stone wall that blockes enemies for 5s.

Grock charges forward, dealing 300 (+50% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage to enemies on the path. Hitting a wall or turret allows him to deal 600 (+150% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage to the nearby enemies and reduce the CD of this skill by 30%.

When Argus takes or deals damage, the blade is empowered. The lower Argus' HP is, the faster his blade charges. When fully charged, his next Basic Attack hits twice rapidly and slightly slash towards his enemies.

Argus puts out a demonic hand at the designated direction, dealing 125 (+60% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to an enemy hero and moving to the front of the target. If this skill fails to hit an enemy hero, he will pull himself to the location. Use Again: If this kill hits a target, Argus makes an extra slash towards the enemy that he captures, dealing 175 (+100% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage.

After a short period of charging, Argus strikes enemies with his demonic blade, dealing 350 (+150% Total Physical ATK) points of physical damage, slowing them down by 80%. Lasts .8s. The demonic blade curses the enemy for 5s. Enemy that is under curse leaves a curse trail that grants Argus extra Movement Speed while he's moving on it.

Argus transforms into a fallen angel, clearing all his debuffs. Meanwhile he charges his blade once and becomes immune to death for 5s. The time he's controlled is decreased by 25%. 100% of damage dealt during the skill's duration will be converted to Argus'HP after skill effect ends.
After casting a skill, the next basic attack or skill will also cast a sound wave that rebounds between enemies, dealing 144 - 200 (+50% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage.
Odette concentrates energy to summon a swan to attack enemies, dealing 250 (+150% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage and slowing them by 70%. Lasts 2s.

Odette fires a magic energy ball forward, dealing Magic Damage to enemies and immobilizing them for 2s. After the ball has reached either its Max range or hit a target, two extra energy balls will strike out to the sides, dealing 250 (50% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damageand immobilizing them for 2s.

Odette gathers energy and deals Continuous Damage to enemies within the area. Deals 240 (+120% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to enemies every 0.5s. Lasts 5s. The field also enhances rebounding speed and number of rebounds of Lakeshare Ambience. Reduces damage taken by 50% while active. Slows enemies by 90%, which decays over time. Lasts 2s.
Each time Lancelot charges, his damage is increased by 10% for 4s, up to 30%.

Lancelot charges towards the designated direction, dealing 100 (+60% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage. The target will be etched with a sword mark. If the target doesn't have a sword mark, then the CD of this skill will be reset.

After a short period of charging, Lancelot perforams an executioner's strike in a forward direction. He is invinicible throughout the process, dealing 400 (+150% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage to his enemies.

Lancelot performs an amazing sword tecinique within an area that may strike enemies up to 3 times, dealing 250 (+100% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage (Damage will be reduced for each extra struck target) and slowing enemies by 0.5s for each hit. This slow effect can stack. This skill only gets 40% Spell Vamp.

Upon death, Diggie will not resurrect at the fountain but will become an Egg. In Egg Form, movement will be possible and Diggie will receive new egg abilities. Diggie is untargetable, but will revive after a period of time.

Diggie throws an owl alarm at the designated direction. The alarm will automatically chase the enemies nearby, dealing 550 (+120% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to them and slowing them by 30%. If there is no enemy hero nearby, it will stay at the spot for 30s. This skill can be stored for 3 times and affected by CD Reduction.

Diggie marks a designated target. After 4s, the target is pulled back to a set location, taking 150 (+50% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage and slowed down by 80%. If enemies escape too far away, they will be pulled back and take damage immediately.
Diggie provides a shield that absorbs 400 (+150% Total Magic Power) damage to him and surrounding allies, and becomes immune to Control Effects. Lasts 3s.
Every 1 points of mana received from equipment and emblems, will also give Hylos 1.5 points of health. When mana is not enough, health can be used to cast skills instead
Hylos stores nature's energy to lock down the target and deals 300 (+80 % Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage and stuns the target for 1s.

Hylos releases the Ring of Punishment, every second dealing to surrounding enemies 95 (+20% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage and slowing them by 6% and Attack Speed by 5%. Stacks up to 10 times. Each stack lasts 2.5s and increaes 7.5% damage of Ring of Punishment. Ring of Punishment will continuously use 30 points of Mana when its active. Use Again: Hylos stops releasing Ring of Punishment.

Hylos creates a pathway for 6s. He recovers 4% of Max HP and is immune to Slowing Effect while on the pathway. Allies moving towards the pathway will have their Movement Speed increased by 60%, enemies moving away from the pathway will have their Movement Speed Reduced by 70%.
Upon death, Zhask commands a Nightmaric Spawn, to self-explode with him, dealing 500 (+100% Total Magic Power) points of True Damage to enemies nearby.

Zhask summons a Nightmaric Spawn, in the designated location. Nightmaric Spawn cannot move but will automatically attack nearby enemies. Every 2 Basic Attacks launch Death Ray at a target, slowing those who are hit continuously for a short time. Nightmaric Spawn will enjoy 70% of Zhask's attributes. If Zhask is too far away from Nightmaric Spawn, it will disappear.

Zhask fires penetrating mental missle in the designated direction, dealing 370 (+100% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to enemies along the way, after which Nightmaric Spawn will cast Mind Eater once. IF both of them hit the same target, then the target will be stunned for 0.5s. Fusion Enhanced: The damage of Zhask and Nightmaric Spawn is fused together, dealing 640 (+180% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage.

Zhask releases a swarm of Nightmeric Clones in the targeted direction. The clones will explode and deal 140 (+50% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to enemies on contact, reducing their Movement Speed by 80%. Lasts 1s. If Nightmeric Clones find no target, they will burrow into the ground and ambush enemies passing by. Fusion Enhanced: Zhask releases several swarms of Nightmeric Clones

Zhask substantially enhances the power of Nightmeric Spawn, increasing all its attributes. The enhance increases as skill levels up. Use Again: Zhask immediately gets off Nightmeric Spawn and loses enhancement.
Targets casting skills within 3 yards of Helcurt are silenced for 1,5s after the skill deals damage. This effect has a 4s cooldown on one single target.

Helcurt teleports to the target location and deals 150 (+70% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage to enemies within the area, silencing them for 1.5s. Using this skill after Dark Night Falls will also inflict an extra Slow Effect of 40% on enemies for 1.5s.

Active: Fires his Deadly Poisoned Stingers forward, each stinger deals 200 (+100% extra physical ATK) [C3physical damage] (minions and jungle monsters only take 70% of the damage), slowing the enemy by 12% (Effect stacks) for 3s. Passive: Each basic attack increases one Deadly Poisoned Stinger, it stores up to 5 stingers and lasts 8s.

Passive: Permanently increases Attack Speed by 10%. Active: Helcurt summons the night, reducing the vision range of all enemy heroes and depriving their sight of allies for 3.5s, while increasing his own Attack Speed by 10% and Movement Speed by 65% for 8s. During the night, the number of stingers stored won't decrease. (Dark Night Falls has no effect on Helcurt when used by an enemy).
Every once a while, Verri enters the Hunting state, during which Pharsa deals extra 300 Magic Damage and slows enemies
Permanently increases 30 points of Magic Attack. Active: Pharsa turns to a mist around Verri, flying over terrain for 5s. Once controlled, this state will end immediately.
Pharsa releases magic energy in the target direction, dealing 350 (+130% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to the enemies hit.
Pharsa flies into mid-air and launches a continuous air raid on the target area in the next 13s, dealing 500 (+160% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to enemies in the area.

Hitting an enemy with a basic attack grants 5 energy. If Lesley doesn't take damage for 5s, her next basic attack has longer range, 35% crit chance, and deals x1.3 damage. Using any skill will reset Lethal Shoot's cooldown.

Lesley enters Camouflage state for 3s, increasing movement speed by 30% and physical attack by 50. Dealing or taking damage will cancel the state. Enemies can detect Lesley's camouflage through distortions in their surroundings.

Throws a tactical grenade forwards, which explodes in fan-shaped area in front of her. Deals damage and knocks enemies back, while Lesley also jumps back slightly. Using this skill will instantly cancel Ultimate Snipe and release its fatal bullets. (Extra attacks will only be launched if fatal bullets have not finished firing.)

Lesley abandons her senses and captures all enemy movements in an area by her mind. She locks onto an enemy hero and fires 4 deadly bullets, dealing 200(+80% Extra Physical ATK) +5% of the target's missing HP as Physical Damage. Each bullet that hits a target will restore 10 energy. Bullets can be blocked by other enemy heroes.

Each time Jawhead deals damage to a target, Jawhead inflicts it with a stack of Compression for 3s (up to 10 stacks). Each stack of Compression increases Jawhead's basic attack damage dealt to the target by 6%.
Body-mounted missiles enter launch state for 5s, randomly firing up to 12 times. Each attack deals 50(+20% Total Physical ATK) physical damage.

Enter Throwing state, gaining a shield and extra movement speed. Use the skill again to throw your closest target to a designated location, dealing 300(+80% Total Physical ATK) physical damage and briefly stunning the target and enmies in the area they land. (Prioritizes heroes. Can be used on teammates, but they won't take damage.

Locks onto an enemy target, charging into them and stunning them for 400(+250% Extra Physical ATK)s, while knocking back enemy units around the target. Deals 400(+250% Extra Physical ATK) physical damage to the target and the units surrounding them.
Each time Angela uses a skill, her movement speed increases by 10% for 4s, up to 30%. This acceleration effect will also be applied to her attached ally.

Launched love energy in a designated direction, dealing 200(+3) magic damage and adding a Lover's Mark. Each stack of Lover's Mark increases damage taken by 10% and reduces movement speed by 15%. Lasts 4s and can be stacked up to 5 times. Restores 100(+1) HP to friendly targets. Up to 5 charges can be restored

Launches a puppet string at the specified target, dealing 300(+11) magic damage. If the target is still connected to the string after 3s, they will be immobilized for 2s and take 450(+17) magic damage. Each Lover's Mark increases the final damage by 20%.

Angela gathers energy to generate a shield for a friendly target, absorbing 1200(+78) damage for 3s. After a period of time, she becomes attached to the friendly target for 12s. If you use this skill again, or if the friendly target dies, this effect will be cancelled.

Each time Gusion casts a skill, a rune will be added to Gusion's dagger. After stacking 3 runes, the next Basic Attack will deal extra damage equal to 15% of the target's lost HP, and restore HP equal to 80% of the damage dealt.

Gusion throws a dagger in the targeted direction, dealing 200 (+50% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to the first target. Use Again: Use again to move behind the target and deal 200 (+100% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to them.

Gusion throws daggers forward, each dealing 110 (+50% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to targets hit and slowing them for 2s. Use Again: Use again to recall daggers, each dealing 65 (+40% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to enemies along the way.

Gusion dashes towards the targeted location, immediately reset the CD of Sword Spike and Shadowblade Slaughter. Use Again: Use again to dash a short distance in the targeted direction. AFter Shadowblade Slaughter being reset, Gusion will be able to immediately throw five daggers and recall ten daggers if the skill is used again.

Valir's skills ignite his targets ablaze, every second dealing Magic Damage that equals to 0.6% of their Max HP, lasts for 4s. When blaze stacks 3 times on a target, it causes an explosion that deals Magic Damage to the target which equals to 8% of its Max HP, at the same time, stuns the target for 1s. (Within 7s, the same target can only be stunned Valir's skills once.)

Valir casts a fireball in a designated direction. The fireball will explode upon hitting an enemy target, dealing 280 (+80% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies within the explosion range and slowing them by 40% for 1. Meanwhile, it ignites the ground along the way, which leads to an explosion after several seconds, dealing 140 (+40% Total Magic Power) Magic Damge to enemies within the area of effect. Valir can stack the fireball up to 2 times. If the first target the fireball hits is an enemy hero, Valir will restoer a fireball at once.

Valir unleashes a torrent of flames forward, knocking enemies back to the very end of its range and dealing 200 (+60% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to them. After being enhanced by the Vengance Flame, the Searing Torrent will generate a fireball at the very end of its range that lasts 4s, dealing 100(+30% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to nearby enemies each second. The torrents of flames and fireall can slow enemies by 25% for 1s.

Valir removes all CC effects from him and surrounds himself with 4 Vengeance Flames, enhancing his Burst Fireball/Searing Torrent. This enhancement increases the skill damage by 30% for 9s. Meanwhile, increases his Movement Speed (decays with time) by 60% in 5s.
Each time Martis uses a skill, the power of the Ashura's Teeth will increase his attack speed by 25%. up to a maximum of 100%. Lasts 4s.
Martis focuses the power of the Ashura's Teeth to draw in ehaities in a fan-shaped area in front of him and attack them for 280 (+100% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage.

There exists nothing between the heavens and earth, nor in-the Three Thousand Worlds, that can resist the might of the Ashura. Harnesses the might of the Ashura's Teeth, blade of the underworld, to rain down unearthly judgement on his enemies, dealing 150 (+90% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage, and can change direction once while attacking. This skill can be used again within a short window of time to charge forward, knocking up and dealing 200 (+150% Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies along the way.

All that lives must die; the only truth lies in emptineiss. In the final secret world, only the one true Ashura King shall emerge triumphant. Charges to the designated enemy hero, dealing 600 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage. If the target is below 50% HP, this skill will deal true damage. Killing a target with this skill will immediately reset its cooldown and increase your movement speed by 100% for 5s (speed increase gradually decays over time).
Uranus absorbs the energy generated by attacks made against him to strengthen himself, regenerating 2-10 HP per second for each stack, over 10 seconds, This effect an be stacked up to 20 times.

Uranus releases two energy spheres that orbit around him, dealing 125 (+30% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to enemy targets, while reducing their Physical Attack and Magic power by 15%, and thier Movement Speed by 30% for 2s. Each time this skill deals damage to a target, the target will receive a stack of mark. Each stack increases the damage of this skill by 40%, 320% maximum. Each energy sphere only deals damage to the same target once.

Uranus charges towards the targeted direction, dealing 80 (+20% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to enemies along the way, dealing 160 (+80% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to enemies in this location and slowing them down by 25%. Meanwhile, Uranus generates an energy shield that absorbs up to 400 (+200% Total Magic Power) damage for 4s. The shield explodes whne broken or at the end of its duration, dealing 300 (+150% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damageto enemies nearby.

Uranus unleashes energy stored within his body to remove the Slow Effect on himself and restore 200 points of HP immediately, while increases Movement Speed by 60% for 8s. (The speed gained decays over time). Uranus directly acquires 5 stacks of Radiance, increasing 50% of the shield and Regen received by 8s, during which he can't be controlled.

The Scarlet Shadow's secret technique. When Hanabi has full HP, 50% of health that would have been granted from lifesteal is converted into a shield for up to 20% of her MAX HP. When this shield is active, Hanabi is immune to all control effects.

Hanabi consumes mana to unleash the flower demon sealed within the Higanbana, firing petal blades at her enemies. After each basic attack hits, a new blade will spawn and deal 50% physical damage to the enemy. Fires 3 petals (damage has diminishing return with each hit). Passive: Hanabi gains 8% Lifesteal. which will increase by 2% each time this skill's level is upgraded.

Fires a kunai in the specified direction, attached to a scroll sealed with demonic flower energy. Deals 300(+80% Total Physical ATK) physical damage to enemies it hits along the way and slows them by 60% for num3(+0%)

When you see the leaves, you cannot see the flowers, when you see the flowers, you cannot see the leaves, and when the flowers open, the leaves die, Hanabi completely unlocks the Higanban's seal and lanches it at the enemy, After hitting an enemy, the Higanbana blooms, dealing 400(+100% Total Physical ATK) physical damage and immobilizing them for 2s, then spreads to nearby enemies, After a certain period of time, if the enemy is still within range of the Higanbana, a new flower will appear, causing the same damage and immobilization effect. The spreading effect only works once per hero.
Each time Chang'e deals damage to enemy units. her next skill damage will increase by 1%(Up to 20%).

Chang'e sends a shockwave forward, dealing 340 / 380 / 420 / 460 / 500 / 540 (+80% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to enemies and slowing them down by 20%. Bunny's Blessings: Bunny will send shockwaves together with Chang'e, each of which deals 20% points of damage and slows enemies down (slowing down effects can be stacked).

Chang'e summons Bunny to bless herself, gaining 400 / 450 / 500 / 550 / 600 / 650 (+80% Total Magic Power) points of Shield and increase Movement speed by 10%. When the Shield exists, her skills and basic attack enjoy the effect of Bunny's Blessings. Basic attack under Bunny's Blessing: Each time Chang'e performs a basic attack, Bunny will deal (+15%Total Physical Attack)(+20% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to enemy targets as well.

Chang'e gathers strength and increases her movement speed by 20%. Meanwhile, she launches 20 Bunny missiles forward, each of which deals 80 / 100 / 130 (+16%Total Magic Power) points of Magical Damage (Deals extra 100% of damage to minions and creeps). Bunny's Blessing: Bunny will launch missles together with Chang'e, each of which deals 50% of damage.

Kaja protects the Celestial Palace and achieves Wrath Sanction every 6 seconds. His next basic attack will send a lightning to enemies, dealing Magical Damage equal to 150(+80%Total Magic Power) points plus 7% of target's Max HP. The lightning will hit the enemies nearby as well (up to 5 times).

Kaja releases a Ringed Electric Blade that quickly expands and contracts. Any enemy target will recieve 150 (+70% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage and experience a temporary speed reduction of 30%. Lasts 1s. Each damage dealt to the enemy units will reduce the CD of Wrath Sanction by 1s.
Kaja moves towards the designated direction and leaves 3 lightning bombs along the way. When enemy units touch the lighting bombs, they will take 200 (+80% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage.

Kaja disables and pulls in an enemy hero for 2 seconds, dealing 360(+0) magical damage and stealing 15 Armor and 10 Magic Resistance from them. Kaja gains 2 times the stolen Armor and Magic Resistance.

Selena can switch freely between her two forms. Eleven Form:When using skills in her Eleven form Selena attaches Abyssal Mark. Stacks up to 2 times.When Abyssal TRap hits an enemy, it immediately adds an Abyssal Mark. Abyssal Form: All damage will consume 1 of Abyssal Mark to deal 240-450 (+40% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage.

Summons Abyssal Devils to lurk in designated locations. When approached by enemy units, they will smother them with their bodies, dealing 350 (+120% Total Magic Power) Magical damage to the target and surrounding enemies after a brief period of time, while reducing their movement speed by 40% for 2s. Devils can also attached to Selena's body, but she will not take damage or be slowed by them. Up to 3 devils can exist at the same time. Damage will decay when a target is takes damage from multiple devils at the same time.

Channels the power of the abyss into magic arrows then fires them in the specified direction. Enemy hit are stunned for at least 0.5s and take 250% (+20% Total Magic Power) Magical damage. Stun duration and damage increase the further the arrows fly. Abyssal Traps hit along the way will be absorbed and the trap's effect will be applied to the target when hit.
Selena melds with the Abyss, entering abyssal form and gaining 30% Movement speed for a short time. She also gains access to new skills while in abyssal form.
After every 2 basic attacks, the 100% damage dealt by Aldous's next attack will be transformed into a shield that lasts for 3 seconds. Activates every 3 seconds.

Aldous unleashes his inner energy to strengthen the next basic attack. Deals 50(+134) points of Physical Damage. If this attack eliminates the enemy hero or unit, the additional damage of this skill is permanently increased by 10/3 points. When attacking minions or monsters, the damage of strengthened basic attacks are raised by 300%.

Aldous assumes a defensive stance that lasts 2 seconds. During this time, Aldous is immune to basic attacks, while damage from other forms of attacks are reduced by 30%. After 1 second, he can reactivate to end it immediately, his scute will explode, dealing 200(+26) points of Physical Damage to surrounding enemy units. The Defensive state will cause a stun effect for 1 seconds at most.

Aldous gains the ability to see the positions of enemy heroes for 5 seconds. During this time, if Aldous uses this skill a second time while it is still in effect, then he permanently sees the position of one enemy hero. When Aldous hits that enemy hero, he will deal 400(+134) plus 10% of their lost Max hp points of Physical Damage and cause 1 seconds of knock back
Dexter launches an attack to help Claude. Deals 35% of Claude's damage in bonus damage to enemy units that were damaged by Claude's basic attacks. (Dexter also enjoys the basic attack bonus)

Claude attacks enemies within a fan-shaped area, dealing 160 (+50% Total Physical Attack) points of Physical Damage and reducing their Movement Speed by 20% and Attack Speed by 10%. When he hits an enemy hero or non-hero unit, his Movement Speed will be increased by 7% and Attack Speed will be increased by 3.5%. Lasts 6s. Stack up to 10 times.

Claude uses Dr. Rooney's device to leave a mirror image of Dexter at a designated location. Dexter's mirror image automatically attacks enemy units. Mirror Image lasts for 5.5 seconds and deals 100% of Dexter's Physical Damage in basic damage. Claude can activate this skill again to switch places with the mirror image.

Claude and Dexter unleash a barrage attack, dealing continuous damage to enemies within the duo's surrounding area. Lasts for 3 seconds. Every hit inflicts 80 (+25% Total Physical Attack) points of Physical Damage to an enemy unit. This attack damage is considered a basic attack and triggers the effects of Claude's basic attacks. Also, generates a shield with 20 (+15% Total Physical Attack) points. Bonus attack speed will also increase hit rate. When Claude's attack is in full burst, enemy minions will experience 450% of damage.

When Vale hits Level 4 / 6 / 8, he can enhance one of his skills. Each time Vale gets a kill or an assist he will gain a stack of Windtalk (up to 12 stacks). Vale gets 5 points of movement speed for each Windtalk stack. Vale can attain a maximum of 60 points of movement speed when Windtalk reaches max stacks.

Vale unleashes two wind blades towards the left and right of a designated area. Wind blades deals 230 (+80% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage. When leveling up, Vale can choose to Damge Range Increase or Damage Increase to this skill.

Vale sends a whirlwind forward. Deals 410 (+120% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage and slows enemies by 30% when the whirlwind hits an enemy unit. Lasts 2s. When leveling up, Vale can choose to add Stop-on-Hit Effect or Knock-Airborne Effect to this skill.

Vale summons a windstorm in a designated area. After 1.5s, the windstorm will explode, dealing 800 (+160% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to enemies in the area. When leveling up, Vale can choose Damage Increase or Crowd Control to this skill.
If the Target’s HP is lower than 30%, Leomord deals critical damage.

Leomord immediately gains a shield and can charge his attack. He then deals 450(+120% Total Physical Attack) points of Physical Damage and slows enemy units by 60%, within the damage area. The longer Leomord charges this skill, the higher its damage. Any actions that interrupt Leomord's charge automatically triggers the attack.
Leomord quickly travels in a square shape, dealing 300(+50% Total Physical Attack) points of Physical Damage to enemies near his path and destination. Slows enemy units by 50%.

Leomord calls for Barbiel, his steed, to rush into the battlefield. Barbiel deals 350(+100% Total Physical Attack) points of Physical Damage to enemy units in his path, slowing them by 50%. If Barbiel comes in contact with Leomord, they will enter a mounted state. While in a mounted state, Leomord gains a whole new set of skills. Leomord's can use basic attacks within a circular area, even while moving. Additionally, Leomord increases his movement speed and physical/magical defense by 40 points.
Barbiel charges forward and knocks back all enemies in the lane. Deals 300(+50% Total Physical Attack) points of Physical Damage.
Barbiel leaps forward, dealing 375(+100% Total Physical Attack) points of Physical Damage to enemy units in the area where he lands, slowing them by 60%.

Lunox has lost all sense of time and reality. As a result, she does not benefit from CD (Cooldown) reduction effects. When Darkening becomes more severe, CD effects become magic PEN. When Brilliance becomes stronger, CD effects become Physical and Magical Defense.

Lunox summons a rain of starlight upon nearby enemies and deals 200 (+110% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage, recovering 60 (20% Total Magic Power) points of HP. The recovering effect doubles when the skill hits enemy heroes.

Lunox unleashes chaos energy forward, dealing 240 (+120% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage and slows enemies by 10%. Lasts 1s. When attacking heroes, Lunox deals extra Magic damage equal to 2% of enemy hero's HP. Gains one stack of Power of Chaos after use.
When Lunox uses the power of Order and Chaos, she will deal 300 (+150% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to the targets along the way and slowing them by 40%. Lasts 2s.
Lunox enters the Light Barrier and deals 100(+14) points of Magic Damage per seconds to nearby enemies. While this skill is active, she is immune and cannot be targeted.
Lunox blinks in designated direction and deals 300(+37) points of Magic Damage to nearby enemies. For 4 seconds, Chaos Assault does not have cooldown.
When units are eliminated nearby, the Blood Demon absorbs their souls into its body to be used as energy. Gains 2 Demon Blood if it's non-hero units and 10 if it it's a hero.

Unlocks after five basic attacks. Hanzo uses Ame no Habakiri to devour a target enemy unit and digest them over a period of time. Doing so regenerates Hanzo gets 10 Demon Blood. Can only be used against creeps and minions. Deals 500 points of True Damage if the target is Lord or the Turtle.

Hanzo opens the soul portal to deal 160(+60% Total Physical Attack) points of Physical Damage immediately. The portal then cause 40(+15% Total Physical Attack) points of Physical Damage every 0.5 seconds and last 4.5 seconds. Everytime the portal deals damage Hanzo recovers Demon Blood. If Hanzo steps into the center of the portal, he will recover the area and Demon Blood used.

With the help of the Blood Demon, Hanzo becomes the Supreme Demon Ninja and achieves 20 Demon Blood. He then dashes forward to gain 30% movement speed and 30% attack speed. When the Demon Ninja is killed Hanzo will return to where the Blood Demon was, stunned and weakened. If the Blood Demon is killed Hanzo dies too. This skill consumes Demon Blood and once it's used up, the Blood Demon would speed up and get back to Hanzo while stop providing buffs.

Belerick receives 30% more HP from equipment items. The Flower of Life deals 50 + 1.5% of Belerick's max HP in Magic Damage to the nearest target, every time Belerick receives 200 damage. The Flower of Life prioritizes targets that have been implanted marked by Nature's Seed.

Belerick casts vines in a designated area, dealing 250 / 290 / 330 / 370 / 410 / 450 (+60%Total Magic Power) points of Magical Damage to enemies on the path, and immobilizing them by 1 seconds. To minions, 50% extra damage will be dealt.

Belerick sacrifices HP to increase his movement speed by 40% and strengthens his next basic attack, which deals Physical Damage equal to 250 / 270 / 290 / 310 / 330 / 350 points plus 8% of his HP lost. Meanwhile, Belerick puts a Nature's Seed effect to enemies that lasts 4 seconds

Belerick recovers 10% of his HP and creates a guarded area. The teammates who have entered the area will enjoy the effect of Flower of Life shortly. When allied heroes within that area take damage, Belerick will absorb 40% of their damage taken. While this skill is active, damage dealt to Belerick is reduced by 30%

Kimmy is obsessed with her chemical creations. As a result, she can move and aim at other directions when using her spray gun but is often less accurate. Her Spray Gun only enjoys 50% of Physical Lifesteal. All her Attack Speed bonus will be converted in to Movement Speed bonus.

Kimmy's Basic Attack will be changed into chemical Ball. Each Chemical Ball deals 19 (+40% Total Physical ATK)(+45% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage. If Kimmy fails to hit a target, the Chemical explodes upon travelling a certain distance, and deals the same damage to nearby enemies. This skill enjoys only 40% of Spell vamp. Use Again: Return to normal Basic Attack.

Kimmy Shoots out the enhanced Chemical Spray and the recoil in turn pushes her backwards for a certain distance. The spray then falls down to the ground and increates contaminated areas. Enemies who walk on these areas will take 14 (+30% Total Physical ATK)(+40% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage every 0.5s and becoming slowed by 40%. Regenerates 40 points of energy using this skill.

Kimmy creates a Luminious Chemical Attacks after charging. Kimmy's Luminescent Attack travel a certain dsitance, dealing 238 (+180% Total Physical ATK)(+210% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to enemy units and 198 (+150% Total Physical ATK)(+170% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to enemies nearby. Regenerate 30 points of energy if Kimmy hits a target with this skill.

The damage Thamuz deals inflict the enemy with Scorch effect, which deals 12 (+5% Total Physical Attack) points of continuous Physical Damage.The effect adds up and deals 160 True Damage when the target moves. Thamuz moves 30% faster when scythes are not with him. Retrieving the scythes will strengthen his next basic attack, dealing 120% points of damage, slowing the target 40% and generates a gush of lava at the places where the target stands. The lava explodes in 2s to deal 280 (+60% Extra Physical Attack) points of Physical Damage.

Thamuz tosses a pair of scythes to a designated direction. After travelling for a certain distance or hitting the first enemy hero, they deal 160 (+100% Total Physical Attack) points of Physical Damage. The scythes will then slow the enemies nearby 40% for a period of time, and deal 60 points of Physical Damage in every 0.5s. After a while, the scythes return to Thamuz, pulling enemies on the path. Thamuz can retrieve the scythes to reduce the next CD.

Thamuz jumps to a designated area to deal 250 (+80% Extra Physical Attack) points of Physical Damage and slow the enemy in 2s when landing. If the scythes are still travelling they will return to Thamuz.

Thamuz spouts the lava restored in his body to deal 300 (+100% Total Physical Attack) points of Physical Damage to nearby area and creates a cauterant atmosphere around him. The atmosphere lasts 9s and deals 20 (+10% Total Physical Attack) points of Physical Damage every 0.3s. Thamuz recovers 2% of HP when dealing damage with his basic attacks and the scythes when this skill is active.
Harith gains insight from his Key. He immediately reduces its time controlled up to 45% (dependent on the number of nearby enemy heroes).

Harith creates a phantom of himself in the opposite direction and releases Synchro Fission, dealing 120 (+70% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to all enemy units on the path. When the 2 Hariths fuse together, an explosion occur ealing 370 (+210% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to all enemies in the explosion area.

Harith dashes towards the designated direction.When he arrives, he steals Magic Attack of nearby enemy heroes, generating a shield that absorbs at least 150 (+150% Total Magic Power) points of damage and enhance the next Basic Attack. Harith's enhanced Basic Attack deals 200 (+80% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage and slows enemies by 40%. Hitting an enemy with Harith's enhanced Basic Attack reduces the CD of the next Chrono Dash by 4s.

Harith uses his Key to summon the Zaman Force. When the multidimensional rift appears, the CD of Chrono Dash is reduced by 4s. The rift then slows the nearby enemies by 35% for a period of time. If Harith comes into contact with the rift using Chrono Dash, he will absorb the energy within it, so as to reduce the CD of Synchro Fission/Chrono Dash by 1s/3s respectively.
Minsitthar inspires the whole team. Whenever teammates slay the enemy heroes, he obtains extra 80 Gold; whenever Minsitthar himself slay enemies, all the teammates obtain extra 20 Gold.

Minsitthar stabs ahead with the Spear of Glory, dealing 175 (+180% Extra Physical Attack) points of Physical Damage to all enemies aong the way. When pulling back the spear, he will also pull towards himself the first enemy the spear hits, dealing 150 (+80% Extra Physical Attack) points of Physical Damage and knocks them back. Meanwhile increases 30% of Attack Speed for 2 seconds.

Minsitthar awakens the strength of the Golden Shield to obtain 200 (+100% Total Physical Attack) Shield and increases 30% Movement Speed immediately. Meanwhile, he releases the power within the Golden Shield forward. The power explodes upon hitting the first enemy unit and deals 230 (+160% Total Physical Attack) points of Physical Damage to all enemies in the area.
